PersonalStatement.text: John Olson, born on 1989-11-19, is a Male based in Williamsbury, Bermuda. He is Divorced and holds Ghanaian nationality. Currently working at Howard-Garcia.

WorkExperience.text: Data Analyst at Harding, Anthony and Hale from 2011 to 2018.
Senior Research Scientist at Howard-Garcia, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Cracow University of Technology (Politechnika Krakowska)
Master's in Engineering from Southern Cross University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys painting.
